Changelog
=========

1.3 (2013-02-19)
----------------

- Depend on ``Products.PluggableAuthService >= 1.10.0`` which has
  been released recently.
  [maurits]


1.2 (2013-01-23)
----------------

- Make sure user ids are strings, not unicode.
  [maurits]


1.1 (2013-01-23)
----------------

- Make sure the Manage Users permission is checked in set_own_login_name.
  [maurits]


1.0 (2013-01-22)
----------------

- Initial release
